name: Police Eagle Prisoner Escape - Control City Crime Rate Chase Criminals, Robbers & thieves
name_original: Police Eagle Prisoner Escape - Control City Crime Rate Chase Criminals, Robbers & thieves
description:
You might have played police dog chase games & prison escape jail breakout games where you played as a police cop in charge of the jail and your duty was to stop the criminals escape out from the jail. You used your police dog to chase the prisoners and brought them back to the lockups. But this time we are bringing you a new flavor where the game is a blend of escape the prison games and the eagle flying games.

We bring you the most exciting Flying Police Eagle Prison Break game in one of the solitary flying eagle simulator games where you have appointed in the jail as in charge of security and equipped with the latest wild eagle. Who can fly and reach their prey in no time. These police bald eagles are much trained and can catch their prey the prisoners escaping from the jail building top roof in no time. You are the in-charge of a prison, a real police eagle to do the security job for the jail. It is your duty now to watch out prison escape by city criminals. The security of the prison and of the city is in your hands now as the thief or the criminal escaping from prison will be the threat of crime to the city.


Features of Police Eagle Prisoner Escape Simulator
=> Extreme chase game
=> Cop hawk Chase Simulator
=> Criminals vs wild Eagle
=> Sniff, chase and catch robbers, thieves and thugs
=> Big Security officer hawk
=> Smooth Controls
=> Exciting but challenging gamePlay
=> Amazing sounds and graphics
